messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] intro and a confession(Betsy)
messages.msgSnippet: On Sun, 05 Jan 2003 12:53:46 -0800 Betsy  ... The ideals of unschooling are very appealing to me, it is putting it into practice that
messages.messageBody:
On Sun, 05 Jan 2003 12:53:46 -0800 Betsy <ecsamhill@...>
writes:
> If complete unschooling doesn't appeal to you, there's also
> "relaxed
> homeschooling" and "eclectic homeschooling". (Or you can make up
> your
> own new name.) Even though I unschool, in real life most of the
> people
> in my support group are "relaxed" or "eclectic".
>
> Betsy
>
The ideals of unschooling are very appealing to me, it is putting it into
practice that I find difficult. What should be natural learning just
doesn't come that naturally to me.
Wende
